item.title: Google Drive - Design
item.description: 1. Gathering System Requirements # As with any systems design interview question, the first thing that we want to do is to gather system requirements; we need to figure out what system we’re building exactly. We’re designing the core user flow of the Google Drive web application. This consists of storing two main entities: folders and files. More specifically, the system should allow users to create folders, upload and download files, and rename and move entities once they’re stored.
